item.title: What we do
item.description: DataThink’s Mission Data are often as complicated and rewarding as the people they measure. DataThink thrives on building solid and thriving relationships between your corporate goals and your data. Our Team We are data scientists, analysts, programmers, statisticians, and problem solvers with over 20 years of combined industry experience. Our core team can expand to meet your needs as we are located next to one of the nation’s top undergraduate data science programs at Brigham Young University - Idaho.
